column4: /etc/fstab is also missing devpts & usbdevfs as well as swap ... does ubuntu use those ?
yes, those others are in mount
um used to having devpts and etc being in there from other distros ... hm
with 2 gb of ram, is it normal to see 0 bytes of swap used after opening openoffice, gimp & eclipse ?
i think I fixed my swap partition after reformatting it, but is there any way to make sure it actually works ?
it is normal... linux only uses swap as a last resorce... its normal to swap lay idle... windows on the onter hand is swap adicted
Open Everething like crazy!
then it will try swap
ive opened evrything I can, no swap .... only .5 gb of memory : ]
open more!
think insane! multiples videos! 3D games and the like!
mutliples VMware player runinig varios OS are good too
did you mange to make linux use more than 2GB of RAM?
so linux did starting using the swap ?
what do you think now of linux use of swap ? :)
beryl depends more of video card than cpu
what is your video card?
should be good. may be you need to change to XGL or config delays in beryl manager
